column4: Identify types of transmission and clutch system Apply basic, special and measuring tools Diagnose the transmission and clutch system malfunction Disassemble the transmission, and clutch system components Evaluate parts condition Replace and assemble the defective parts of transmission and clutch system Apply standard value of torque, clearances and limits Observe environmental rules and regulations Apply 5S Apply tools and equipment maintenance Apply service shop maintenance
